message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering I'm the one making the first offer.
Your turn Alice. How about we be a little more fair and split it 55-45 this time? Time is money, after all.
I'll give you a slightly better offer than before. Take it before the money loses more value!
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'll meet you in the middle - 52-48.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Don't let the money slip away!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm being more than fair. 51-49, take it or leave it.  We're running out of time!
I'll give a bit, but I won't go below this. Inflation is killing me!
Alice, this is insane! I'm giving you practically half! It's 505,000 for me and 495,000 for you.  Take it before we both get nothing!
